As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long Tim Cooke about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, Mr. Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog.`` And over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured.''
